GK19amaru_u:2: This edition is based on the one in Kāvya-saṅgraha edited by Jīvānanda
GK19amaru_u:3: Vidyāsāgara. It has been compared with the Motilal Banarsidass edition (1983)
GK19amaru_u:4: containing the commentary of Arjunavarmadeva. The number in parentheses at the
GK19amaru_u:5: end of the last line of each verse is the number of the verse in the Motilal
GK19amaru_u:6: edition. There seems to be a great deal of variation in the order and numbering
GK19amaru_u:7: of the verses between the editions and the commentators. The order of the verses
GK19amaru_u:8: found in the Kāvya-saṅgraha forms the backbone of the order of the verses
GK19amaru_u:10: even though Arjunavarmadeva considers some of the verses found
GK19amaru_u:11: in that edition to be interpolations. Those suspect verses have been noted in
GK19amaru_u:13: The parentheses in between verses contain citations for the major
GK19amaru_u:14: anthologies. These have been taken from Sures Chandra Banerji's
GK19amaru_u:15: edition of Śrīdharadāsa's Sadukti-karṇāmṛta. The abbreviations for those
GK19amaru_u:23: (These equivalences have been taken from the Banerji edition of Sad-ukti-karṇāmṛta and the De edition of Padyāvalī.)
GK19amaru_u:33: kāmīvārdrāparādhaḥ sa dahatu duritaṃ śāmbhavo vaḥ śarāgniḥ //2// (2)
GK19amaru_u:43: kathaya sukṛtī ko'yaṃ mugdhe tvayādya vilokyate //4// (4)
GK19amaru_u:45: datto'syāḥ praṇayastvayaiva bhavatā ceyaṃ ciraṃ lālitā
GK19amaru_u:46: daivād adya kila tvameva kṛtavān asyā navaṃ vipriyam /
GK19amaru_u:47: manyurduḥsaha eṣa yātyupaśamaṃ no sāntvavādaiḥ sphuṭaṃ
GK19amaru_u:55: nāryastanvi haṭhāddharanti ramaṇaṃ tiṣṭhanti no vāritās
GK19amaru_u:56: tatkiṃ tāmyasi kiṃ ca rodiṣi mudhā tāsāṃ priyaṃ mā kṛthāḥ /
GK19amaru_u:60: nāryo mugdhaśaṭhā haranti ramaṇaṃ tiṣṭhanti no vāritās ...
GK19amaru_u:62: nītvā keliniketanaṃ dayitayā sāyaṃ sakhīnāṃ puraḥ /
GK19amaru_u:64: dhanyo hanyata eva nihnutiparaḥ preyān rudatyā hasan //8// (9)
GK19amaru_u:74: yātāḥ kiṃ na milanti sundari punaścintā tvayā matkṛte
GK19amaru_u:75: no kāryā nitarāṃ kṛśāmi kathayatyevaṃ sabāṣpe mayi /
GK19amaru_u:78: dhīraṃ vāridharasya vāri kirataḥ śrutvā niśīthe dhvaniṃ
GK19amaru_u:84: kaṭhinahṛdayastyaktvā śayyāṃ balād gata eva saḥ /
GK19amaru_u:86: punarapi hatavrīḍaṃ cetaḥ prayāti karomi kim //12//(15)
GK19amaru_u:95: ajñānena parāṅmukhīṃ paribhavād āśliṣya māṃ duḥkhitāṃ
GK19amaru_u:96: kiṃ labdhaṃ caṭula tvayeha nayatā saubhāgyametāṃ daśām /
GK19amaru_u:116: mugdhākṣī svaiptīti tatparijanaṃ svairaṃ priye pṛcchati /
GK19amaru_u:126: paśyāmo mayi kiṃ prapadyata iti sthairyaṃ mayālambitaṃ
GK19amaru_u:129: savyājaṃ hasitaṃ mayā dhṛtiharo bāṣpastu muktastayā //20//(24)
GK19amaru_u:138: ityukte kva tad ityudīrya sahasā tatsampramārṣṭuṃ mayā
GK19amaru_u:140: tvaṃ mugdhākṣi vinaiva kañculikayā dhatse manohāriṇīṃ
GK19amaru_u:147: dṛṣṭe nirvahaṇaṃ bhaviṣyati kathaṃ mānasya tasmiñjane //24//(28)
GK19amaru_u:150: kānte katyapi vāsarāṇi gamaya tvaṃ mīlayitvā dṛśau
GK19amaru_u:151: svasti svasti nimīlayāmi nayane yāvan na śūnyā diśaḥ /
GK19amaru_u:162: tanurapi na te doṣo'smākaṃ vidhistu parāṅmukhaḥ /
GK19amaru_u:163: tava yathā tathābhūtaṃ prema prapannamimāṃ daśāṃ
GK19amaru_u:164: prakṛticapale kā naḥ pīḍā gate hatajīvite //27// (30)
GK19amaru_u:166: urasi nihitastāro hāraḥ kṛtā jaghane ghane
GK19amaru_u:172: kiṃ mugdhe na mayā kṛtaṃ ramaṇadhīrmuktā tvayā gamyatāṃ
GK19amaru_u:173: dusthaṃ tiṣṭhasi yacca pathyamadhunā kartāsmi tacchroṣyasi //29//(33)
GK19amaru_u:174: sā bālā vayamapragalbhamanasaḥ sā strī vayaṃ kātarāḥ
GK19amaru_u:176: sākrāntā jaghanasthalena guruṇā gantuṃ na śaktā vayaṃ
GK19amaru_u:182: dhṛtyā na kṣaṇamāsitaṃ vyavasitaṃ cittena gantuṃ puraḥ /
GK19amaru_u:183: gantuṃ niścitacetasi priyatame sarve samaṃ prasthitā
GK19amaru_u:191: prāptaṃ tairamṛtaṃ mudhaiva mathito mūḍhaiḥ suraiḥ sāgaraḥ //32//(36)
GK19amaru_u:194: premāvāsitayā mayā saralayā nyastaṃ mukhaṃ tanmukhe /
GK19amaru_u:196: lajjāsīn mama tena sāpyapahṛtā tatkālayogyaiḥ kramaiḥ //33//(37)
GK19amaru_u:197: kopo yatra bhrūkuṭiracanā nigraho yatra maunaṃ
GK19amaru_u:199: tasya premṇastad idamadhunā vaiṣamaṃ paśya jātaṃ
GK19amaru_u:200: tvaṃ pādānte luṭhasi nahi me manyumokṣaḥ khalāyāḥ //34//(38)
GK19amaru_u:202: sutanu jahihi kopaṃ paśya pādānataṃ māṃ
GK19amaru_u:203: na khalu tava kadācitkopa evaṃ vidho'bhūt /
GK19amaru_u:209: mā mā mānada māti māmalamiti kṣāmākṣarollāpinī
GK19amaru_u:210: suptā kiṃ nu mṛtā nu kiṃ manasi me līnā vilīnā nu kim //36//(40)
GK19amaru_u:219: nivṛtte sadbhāve jana iva jane gacchati puraḥ /
GK19amaru_u:221: na jāne ko heturdalati śatadhā yan na hṛdayam //38//(43)
GK19amaru_u:230: prasarati kathā bahvī yūnoryathā na tathā ratiḥ //39//(44)
GK19amaru_u:232: puṣpāṇāṃ prakaraḥ smitena racito no kundajātyādibhiḥ /
GK19amaru_u:233: dattaḥ svedamucā payodharayuge nārghyo na kumbhāmbhasā
GK19amaru_u:244: tāvantyeva kṛtāgaso drutataraṃ vyāhṛtya patyuḥ puraḥ /
GK19amaru_u:245: prārabdhā purato yathā manasijasyājñā tathā vartituṃ
GK19amaru_u:246: premṇo maugdhyavibhūṣaṇasya sahajaḥ ko'pyeṣa kāntaḥ kramaḥ //43//(48)
GK19amaru_u:257: sphuṭo rekhānyāsaḥ kathamapi sa tādṛk pariṇato
GK19amaru_u:258: gatā yena vyaktaṃ punaravayavaiḥ saiva taruṇī // 46//
GK19amaru_u:263: ruṣā brahmāstraṃ me śarasi nihito vāmacaraṇaḥ //
GK19amaru_u:267: kimidamathavā satyaṃ mugdhe tvayā hi viniścitaṃ
GK19amaru_u:268: yad abhirucitaṃ tan me kṛtvā priye sukhamāsyatām //47//(53)
GK19amaru_u:277: nūnaṃ bibheda yad asau prasasāda sadyaḥ // 49//
GK19amaru_u:297: bāle nātha vimuñca mānini ruṣaṃ roṣān mayā kiṃ kṛtaṃ
GK19amaru_u:298: khedo'smāsu na me'parādhyati bhavān sarve'parādhā mayi /
GK19amaru_u:299: tatkiṃ rodiṣi gadgadena vacasā kasyāgrato rudyate
GK19amaru_u:300: nanvetan mama kā tavāsmi dayitā nāsmītyato rudyate //53//(57)
GK19amaru_u:305: pītvā śītkārivaktraṃ śiśuharidṛśāṃ haimanā vānti vātāḥ // 54//
GK19amaru_u:307: śrutvā tanvyā niśīthe navaghanarasitaṃ viślathāṅkaṃ patitvā
GK19amaru_u:310: smṛtvā smṛtvā priyasya skhalitamṛduvaco rudyate pānthabadhvā // 55//
GK19amaru_u:312: śliṣṭaḥ kaṇṭhe kimiti na mayā mūḍhayā prāṇanāthaś
GK19amaru_u:313: cumbatyasmin vadanavidhutiḥ kiṃ kṛtā kiṃ na dṛṣṭaḥ /
GK19amaru_u:315: paścāttāpaṃ vahati taruṇī premṇi jāte rasajñā //56//(58)
GK19amaru_u:317: śrutvā nāmāpi yasya sphuṭaghanapulakaṃ jāyate'ṅgaṃ samantāt
GK19amaru_u:320: bhagnā mānasya cintā bhavati mama pnarvajramayyāḥ kadā nu //57//(59)
GK19amaru_u:339: puṇyāhaṃ vraja maṅgalaṃ sudivasaṃ prātaḥ prayātasya te
GK19amaru_u:345: no vā pādatale tayā nipatitaṃ tiṣṭheti noktaṃ vacaḥ /
GK19amaru_u:351: na jāne saṃmukhāyāte priyāṇi vadati priye /
GK19amaru_u:352: sarvāṇyaṅgāni me yānti śrotratāṃ kimu netratām //63//(64)
GK19amaru_u:359: pādāsakte suciramiha te vāmatā kaiva kānte
GK19amaru_u:362: bāṣpodbhedaistad anu sahasā na sthitaṃ na prayātam //65//(68)
GK19amaru_u:364: tato nu tvaṃ preyānvayamapi hatāśāḥ priyatamāḥ /
GK19amaru_u:368: mānaṃ dhatsva dhṛtiṃ vadhāna ṛjutāṃ dūre kuru preyasi /
GK19amaru_u:370: nīceḥ śaṃsa hṛdi sthito nanu sa me prāṇeśvaraḥ śroṣyati //67//(70)
GK19amaru_u:377: prāṇādhiko vasati yatra janaḥ priyo me /
GK19amaru_u:378: ekākinī vada kathaṃ na bibheṣi bāle
GK19amaru_u:383: mugdhā kudmalitānanena dadhato vāyuṃ sthitā tasya sā
GK19amaru_u:384: bhrāntyā dhūrtatayā ca vepathumatī tenāniśaṃ cumbitā //70//(72)
GK19amaru_u:385: sphuṭatu hṛdayaṃ kāmaṃ kāmaṃ karatu tanuṃ tanuṃ
GK19amaru_u:386: na sakhi caṭulapremṇā kāryaṃ punardayitena me /
GK19amaru_u:391: śayyā samprati komalāṅgi paruṣetyāropya māṃ vakṣasi /
GK19amaru_u:400: dattaikaṃ saśucā gṛhaṃ prati padaṃ pānthastriyāsminkṣaṇe
GK19amaru_u:405: tanvaṅgyā ratikātareṇa manasā nītaḥ pradīpaḥ śamam //75//(77)
GK19amaru_u:412: tacchūnye punarāsthitāsmi bhavane prāṇāsta ete dṛḍhāḥ
GK19amaru_u:417: lajjānamramukhī priyeṇa hasatā bālā ciraṃ cumbitā //78//(82)
GK19amaru_u:422: jātā notkalikā stanau na lulitau gātraṃ na romāñcitaṃ
GK19amaru_u:424: dṛṣṭenāva mano hṛtaṃ dhṛtimuṣā prāṇeśvareṇādya me
GK19amaru_u:428: ityākṣipya yadā samastamaghṛṇo gantuṃ pravṛttaḥ śaṭhaḥ
GK19amaru_u:432: na dṛṣṭeḥ śaithilyaṃ milana iti ceto dahati me
GK19amaru_u:440: ghana ghaṭayituṃ nisnehaṃ tvāṃ ya eva nivartane
GK19amaru_u:441: prabhavati gavāṃ kinnaśchinnaṃ sa eva dhanañjayaḥ //84//(32)
GK19amaru_u:443: gacchantī kva nu gacchasīti vidhṛtā bālā paṭānte mayā /
GK19amaru_u:444: pratyāvṛttamukhī sabāṣpanayanā māṃ muñca muñceti sā
GK19amaru_u:454: priyo manyurjātastava niranurodhe na tu vayam //87// (81)
GK19amaru_u:472: tanvaṅgyā gurusannidhau nayanajaṃ yad vāri saṃstambhitaṃ
GK19amaru_u:478: dhairyaṃ kartumapi sthirīkṛtamidaṃ cetaḥ kathañcin mayā
GK19amaru_u:484: dhairyaṃ kartumapi sthirīkṛtamidaṃ cetaḥ kathañcin mayā
GK19amaru_u:485: baddho mānaparigrahe parikaraḥ siddhistu daive sthitā //
GK19amaru_u:489: yatnenāpi na yāti locanapathaṃ kānteti jānannapi /
GK19amaru_u:493: mlānaṃ pāṇḍu kṛśaṃ viyogavidhuraṃ lambālakaṃ sālasaṃ
GK19amaru_u:496: yatpītaṃ sutanormayā vadanakaṃ vaktuṃ na tatpāryate //94//(88)
GK19amaru_u:497: saivāhaṃ pramadā nṛṇāmadhigatāvetau ca tau nūpurāv
GK19amaru_u:499: itthaṃ lajjitayā smṛterupagame matvā tanuṃ sambhramāt
GK19amaru_u:505: santyevātra gṛhe gṛhe yuvatayastāḥ pṛccha gatvādhunā
GK19amaru_u:506: preyāṃsaḥ praṇamanti kiṃ tava punardāso yathā vartate /
GK19amaru_u:507: ātmadrohiṇi durjanaiḥ pralapitaṃ karṇe'niśaṃ mā kṛthāś
GK19amaru_u:510: nidrā neti na dṛśyate priyamukhaṃ rātrindivaṃ rudyate /
GK19amaru_u:512: sakhyaḥ kaṃ guṇamākalayya dayite mānaṃ vayaṃ kāritāḥ //98// (92)
GK19amaru_u:514: adyārabhya yadi priye punarahaṃ mānasya vā'nyasya vā
GK19amaru_u:517: eko vā divasaḥ payodamalino yāyānmama prāvṛṣi //99//(93)
GK19amaru_u:518: idaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ priyatama tanu śvetamatha kiṃ
GK19amaru_u:521: sa evānyo jātaḥ sakhi paricitāḥ kasya puruṣāḥ //100//(94)
GK19amaru_u:524: iti hi capalo mānārambhastathāpi hi notsahe
GK19amaru_u:529: gṛhītā dharmille sakhi sa ca mayā gāḍhamadhare //102//(98)
GK19amaru_u:531: rāge yāte'tibhūmiṃ vikasati sutarāṃ gocare dūtikāyāḥ /
GK19amaru_u:534: kānte talpamupāgate vigalitā nīvī svayaṃ bandhanād
GK19amaru_u:537: ko'yaṃ kāsmi rataṃ nu vā kathamiti svalpāpi me na smṛtiḥ //104//(101)
GK19amaru_u:538: prāsāde sā diśi diśi ca sā pṛṣṭhataḥ sā puraḥ sā
GK19amaru_u:539: paryaṅke sā pathi pathi ca sā tadviyogāturasya /
GK19amaru_u:540: haṃho cetaḥ prakṛtiraparā nāsti me kāpi sā sā
GK19amaru_u:541: sā sā sā sā jagati sakale ko'yamadvaitavādaḥ //105//(102)
GK19amaru_u:543: tvayākāṇḍe mānaḥ kimiti sarale preyasi kṛtaḥ /
GK19amaru_u:547: Verses found in Arjunavarmadeva's version not found here
GK19amaru_u:549: tūṣṇīṃ rodiṣi kopane bahutaraṃ phūtkṛtya rodiṣyasi /
GK19amaru_u:552: tadvaktrābhimukhaṃ mukhaṃ vinamitaṃ dṛṣṭiḥ kṛtā pādayos
GK19amaru_u:554: pāṇibhyāṃ ca tiraskṛtaḥ sapulakaḥ svedodgamo gaṇḍayoḥ
GK19amaru_u:555: sakhyaḥ kiṃ karavāṇi yānti śatadhā yatkañcuke sandhayaḥ //(11)
GK19amaru_u:557: yo dīrghaṃ divasaṃ viṣahya viṣamaṃ yatnātkathaṃciddhṛtaḥ /
GK19amaru_u:563: mānasyāpi jalāñjaliḥ sarabhasaṃ lokena datto yathā //(54)
GK19amaru_u:569: tatrāpyarpayituṃ dṛśaṃ suracitāṃ śaknomi na vrīḍayā /
GK19amaru_u:571: mātaḥ kaṃ śaraṇaṃ vrajāmi hṛdaye jīrṇo'nurāgānalaḥ //(63)
GK19amaru_u:573: svabhāvaśobhānatimātrabhūṣaṇā tanustaveyaṃ bata kiṃ nu sundari //(65)
GK19amaru_u:575: na kiṃcidityeva jagāda yadvadhūḥ kiyanna tenaiva tayāsya varṇitam //(66)

GK19amaru_u:745: prakṛticapale kā naḥ pīḍā gate hatajīvite //27//(30)
GK19amaru_u:747: urasi nihitastāro hāraḥ kṛtā jaghane ghane
GK19amaru_u:753: kiṃ mugdhe na mayā kṛtaṃ ramaṇadhīrmuktā tvayā gamyatāṃ
GK19amaru_u:754: dusthaṃ tiṣṭhasi yacca pathyamadhunā kartāsmi tacchroṣyasi //29//(33)
GK19amaru_u:755: sā bālā vayamapragalbhamanasaḥ sā strī vayaṃ kātarāḥ
GK19amaru_u:757: sākrāntā jaghanasthalena guruṇā gantuṃ na śaktā vayaṃ
GK19amaru_u:763: dhṛtyā na kṣaṇamāsitaṃ vyavasitaṃ cittena gantuṃ puraḥ /
GK19amaru_u:764: gantuṃ niścitacetasi priyatame sarve samaṃ prasthitā
GK19amaru_u:772: prāptaṃ tairamṛtaṃ mudhaiva mathito mūḍhaiḥ suraiḥ sāgaraḥ //32//(36)
GK19amaru_u:775: premāvāsitayā mayā saralayā nyastaṃ mukhaṃ tanmukhe /
GK19amaru_u:777: lajjāsīn mama tena sāpyapahṛtā tatkālayogyaiḥ kramaiḥ //33//(37)
GK19amaru_u:778: kopo yatra bhrūkuṭiracanā nigraho yatra maunaṃ
GK19amaru_u:780: tasya premṇastad idamadhunā vaiṣamaṃ paśya jātaṃ
GK19amaru_u:781: tvaṃ pādānte luṭhasi nahi me manyumokṣaḥ khalāyāḥ //34//(38)
GK19amaru_u:783: sutanu jahihi kopaṃ paśya pādānataṃ māṃ
GK19amaru_u:784: na khalu tava kadācitkopa evaṃ vidho'bhūt /
GK19amaru_u:790: mā mā mānada māti māmalamiti kṣāmākṣarollāpinī
GK19amaru_u:791: suptā kiṃ nu mṛtā nu kiṃ manasi me līnā vilīnā nu kim //36//(40)
GK19amaru_u:800: nivṛtte sadbhāve jana iva jane gacchati puraḥ /
GK19amaru_u:802: na jāne ko heturdalati śatadhā yan na hṛdayam //38//(43)
GK19amaru_u:811: prasarati kathā bahvī yūnoryathā na tathā ratiḥ //39//(44)
GK19amaru_u:813: puṣpāṇāṃ prakaraḥ smitena racito no kundajātyādibhiḥ /
GK19amaru_u:814: dattaḥ svedamucā payodharayuge nārghyo na kumbhāmbhasā
GK19amaru_u:826: tāvantyeva kṛtāgaso drutataraṃ vyāhṛtya patyuḥ puraḥ /
GK19amaru_u:827: prārabdhā purato yathā manasijasyājñā tathā vartituṃ
GK19amaru_u:828: premṇo maugdhyavibhūṣaṇasya sahajaḥ ko'pyeṣa kāntaḥ kramaḥ //43//(48)
GK19amaru_u:839: sphuṭo rekhānyāsaḥ kathamapi sa tādṛk pariṇato
GK19amaru_u:840: gatā yena vyaktaṃ punaravayavaiḥ saiva taruṇī //46//(51)
GK19amaru_u:845: ruṣā brahmāstraṃ me śarasi nihito vāmacaraṇaḥ //
GK19amaru_u:849: kimidamathavā satyaṃ mugdhe tvayā hi viniścitaṃ
GK19amaru_u:850: yad abhirucitaṃ tan me kṛtvā priye sukhamāsyatām //47//(53)
GK19amaru_u:859: nūnaṃ bibheda yad asau prasasāda sadyaḥ //49//
GK19amaru_u:879: bāle nātha vimuñca mānini ruṣaṃ roṣān mayā kiṃ kṛtaṃ
GK19amaru_u:880: khedo'smāsu na me'parādhyati bhavān sarve'parādhā mayi /
GK19amaru_u:881: tatkiṃ rodiṣi gadgadena vacasā kasyāgrato rudyate
GK19amaru_u:882: nanvetan mama kā tavāsmi dayitā nāsmītyato rudyate //53//(57)
GK19amaru_u:887: pītvā śītkārivaktraṃ śiśuharidṛśāṃ haimanā vānti vātāḥ//54//
GK19amaru_u:889: śrutvā tanvyā niśīthe navaghanarasitaṃ viślathāṅkaṃ patitvā
GK19amaru_u:892: smṛtvā smṛtvā priyasya skhalitamṛduvaco rudyate pānthabadhvā //55//
GK19amaru_u:894: śliṣṭaḥ kaṇṭhe kimiti na mayā mūḍhayā prāṇanāthaś
GK19amaru_u:895: cumbatyasmin vadanavidhutiḥ kiṃ kṛtā kiṃ na dṛṣṭaḥ /
GK19amaru_u:897: paścāttāpaṃ vahati taruṇī premṇi jāte rasajñā //56//(58)
GK19amaru_u:899: śrutvā nāmāpi yasya sphuṭaghanapulakaṃ jāyate'ṅgaṃ samantāt
GK19amaru_u:902: bhagnā mānasya cintā bhavati mama pnarvajramayyāḥ kadā nu //57//(59)
GK19amaru_u:921: puṇyāhaṃ vraja maṅgalaṃ sudivasaṃ prātaḥ prayātasya te
GK19amaru_u:927: no vā pādatale tayā nipatitaṃ tiṣṭheti noktaṃ vacaḥ /
GK19amaru_u:933: na jāne saṃmukhāyāte priyāṇi vadati priye /
GK19amaru_u:934: sarvāṇyaṅgāni me yānti śrotratāṃ kimu netratām //63//(64)
GK19amaru_u:941: pādāsakte suciramiha te vāmatā kaiva kānte
GK19amaru_u:944: bāṣpodbhedaistad anu sahasā na sthitaṃ na prayātam //65//(68)
GK19amaru_u:946: tato nu tvaṃ preyānvayamapi hatāśāḥ priyatamāḥ /
GK19amaru_u:950: mānaṃ dhatsva dhṛtiṃ vadhāna ṛjutāṃ dūre kuru preyasi /
GK19amaru_u:952: nīceḥ śaṃsa hṛdi sthito nanu sa me prāṇeśvaraḥ śroṣyati //67//(70)
GK19amaru_u:959: prāṇādhiko vasati yatra janaḥ priyo me /
GK19amaru_u:960: ekākinī vada kathaṃ na bibheṣi bāle
GK19amaru_u:965: mugdhā kudmalitānanena dadhato vāyuṃ sthitā tasya sā
GK19amaru_u:966: bhrāntyā dhūrtatayā ca vepathumatī tenāniśaṃ cumbitā //70//(72)
GK19amaru_u:967: sphuṭatu hṛdayaṃ kāmaṃ kāmaṃ karatu tanuṃ tanuṃ
GK19amaru_u:968: na sakhi caṭulapremṇā kāryaṃ punardayitena me /
GK19amaru_u:973: śayyā samprati komalāṅgi paruṣetyāropya māṃ vakṣasi /
GK19amaru_u:982: dattaikaṃ saśucā gṛhaṃ prati padaṃ pānthastriyāsminkṣaṇe
GK19amaru_u:987: tanvaṅgyā ratikātareṇa manasā nītaḥ pradīpaḥ śamam //75//(77)
GK19amaru_u:994: tacchūnye punarāsthitāsmi bhavane prāṇāsta ete dṛḍhāḥ
GK19amaru_u:999: lajjānamramukhī priyeṇa hasatā bālā ciraṃ cumbitā //78//(82)
GK19amaru_u:1004: jātā notkalikā stanau na lulitau gātraṃ na romāñcitaṃ
GK19amaru_u:1006: dṛṣṭenāva mano hṛtaṃ dhṛtimuṣā prāṇeśvareṇādya me
GK19amaru_u:1010: ityākṣipya yadā samastamaghṛṇo gantuṃ pravṛttaḥ śaṭhaḥ
GK19amaru_u:1015: na dṛṣṭeḥ śaithilyaṃ milana iti ceto dahati me
GK19amaru_u:1023: ghana ghaṭayituṃ nisnehaṃ tvāṃ ya eva nivartane
GK19amaru_u:1024: prabhavati gavāṃ kinnaśchinnaṃ sa eva dhanañjayaḥ //84//(32)
GK19amaru_u:1026: gacchantī kva nu gacchasīti vidhṛtā bālā paṭānte mayā /
GK19amaru_u:1027: pratyāvṛttamukhī sabāṣpanayanā māṃ muñca muñceti sā
GK19amaru_u:1037: priyo manyurjātastava niranurodhe na tu vayam //87//(81)
GK19amaru_u:1055: tanvaṅgyā gurusannidhau nayanajaṃ yad vāri saṃstambhitaṃ
GK19amaru_u:1061: dhairyaṃ kartumapi sthirīkṛtamidaṃ cetaḥ kathañcin mayā
GK19amaru_u:1067: dhairyaṃ kartumapi sthirīkṛtamidaṃ cetaḥ kathañcin mayā
GK19amaru_u:1068: baddho mānaparigrahe parikaraḥ siddhistu daive sthitā //
GK19amaru_u:1072: yatnenāpi na yāti locanapathaṃ kānteti jānannapi /
GK19amaru_u:1076: mlānaṃ pāṇḍu kṛśaṃ viyogavidhuraṃ lambālakaṃ sālasaṃ
GK19amaru_u:1079: yatpītaṃ sutanormayā vadanakaṃ vaktuṃ na tatpāryate //94//(88)
GK19amaru_u:1080: saivāhaṃ pramadā nṛṇāmadhigatāvetau ca tau nūpurāv
GK19amaru_u:1082: itthaṃ lajjitayā smṛterupagame matvā tanuṃ sambhramāt
GK19amaru_u:1088: santyevātra gṛhe gṛhe yuvatayastāḥ pṛccha gatvādhunā
GK19amaru_u:1089: preyāṃsaḥ praṇamanti kiṃ tava punardāso yathā vartate /
GK19amaru_u:1090: ātmadrohiṇi durjanaiḥ pralapitaṃ karṇe'niśaṃ mā kṛthāś
GK19amaru_u:1093: nidrā neti na dṛśyate priyamukhaṃ rātrindivaṃ rudyate /
GK19amaru_u:1095: sakhyaḥ kaṃ guṇamākalayya dayite mānaṃ vayaṃ kāritāḥ //98//(92)
GK19amaru_u:1097: adyārabhya yadi priye punarahaṃ mānasya vā'nyasya vā
GK19amaru_u:1100: eko vā divasaḥ payodamalino yāyānmama prāvṛṣi //99//(93)
GK19amaru_u:1101: idaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ priyatama tanu śvetamatha kiṃ
GK19amaru_u:1104: sa evānyo jātaḥ sakhi paricitāḥ kasya puruṣāḥ //100//(94)
GK19amaru_u:1107: iti hi capalo mānārambhastathāpi hi notsahe
GK19amaru_u:1112: gṛhītā dharmille sakhi sa ca mayā gāḍhamadhare //102//(98)
GK19amaru_u:1114: rāge yāte'tibhūmiṃ vikasati sutarāṃ gocare dūtikāyāḥ /
GK19amaru_u:1117: kānte talpamupāgate vigalitā nīvī svayaṃ bandhanād
GK19amaru_u:1120: ko'yaṃ kāsmi rataṃ nu vā kathamiti svalpāpi me na smṛtiḥ //104//(101)
GK19amaru_u:1121: prāsāde sā diśi diśi ca sā pṛṣṭhataḥ sā puraḥ sā
GK19amaru_u:1122: paryaṅke sā pathi pathi ca sā tadviyogāturasya /
GK19amaru_u:1123: haṃho cetaḥ prakṛtiraparā nāsti me kāpi sā sā
GK19amaru_u:1124: sā sā sā sā jagati sakale ko'yamadvaitavādaḥ //105//(102) ***
GK19amaru_u:1125: Verses found in Arjunavarmadeva's version not found here
GK19amaru_u:1127: tūṣṇīṃ rodiṣi kopane bahutaraṃ phūtkṛtya rodiṣyasi /
GK19amaru_u:1130: tadvaktrābhimukhaṃ mukhaṃ vinamitaṃ dṛṣṭiḥ kṛtā pādayos
GK19amaru_u:1132: pāṇibhyāṃ ca tiraskṛtaḥ sapulakaḥ svedodgamo gaṇḍayoḥ
GK19amaru_u:1133: sakhyaḥ kiṃ karavāṇi yānti śatadhā yatkañcuke sandhayaḥ //(11)
GK19amaru_u:1135: yo dīrghaṃ divasaṃ viṣahya viṣamaṃ yatnātkathaṃciddhṛtaḥ /
GK19amaru_u:1141: mānasyāpi jalāñjaliḥ sarabhasaṃ lokena datto yathā //(54)
GK19amaru_u:1147: tatrāpyarpayituṃ dṛśaṃ suracitāṃ śaknomi na vrīḍayā /
GK19amaru_u:1149: mātaḥ kaṃ śaraṇaṃ vrajāmi hṛdaye jīrṇo'nurāgānalaḥ //(63)
GK19amaru_u:1151: svabhāvaśobhānatimātrabhūṣaṇā tanustaveyaṃ bata kiṃ nu sundari //(65)
GK19amaru_u:1153: na kiṃcidityeva jagāda yadvadhūḥ kiyanna tenaiva tayāsya varṇitam //(66)
GK19amaru_u:1155: tvayākāṇḍe mānaḥ kimiti sarale preyasi kṛtaḥ /
